

sudo nano /etc/network/interfaces


sudo ifdown eth0; sudo ifup eth0
ifconfig 

sudo ifdown eth1; sudo ifup eth1
ifconfig 

admin@raspberrypi:~ $ cat /etc/network/interfaces

# ~ generated by alfa_common.platform._dump_net_sections()
# ~ DO NOT EDIT BY HAND (any change can get lost).


# - lo
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

# - eth0
auto eth0
iface eth0 inet static
    address 192.168.0.100
    netmask 255.255.255.0
    dns-nameservers 8.8.8.8

# - eth1
auto eth1
iface eth1 inet static
    address 192.168.1.1
    netmask 255.255.255.0

#iface eth1 inet dhcp

# - wlan0
auto wlan0
iface wlan0 inet dhcp
    pre-up wpa_supplicant -D nl80211 -i wlan0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant_ALFA_PROD.conf -B
    post-down killall -q wpa_supplicant


[Desktop Entry]
Version=0.0.1
Type=Application
Encoding=UTF-8
Name=CR6
Comment=CR6 spervisor
Exec=/home/pi/Desktop/CR6.sh
Terminal=true
